column2: Of the six origins of offences by how many origins do the offences for one indulging in sexual intercourse originate?
they originate by body and by mind, not by voice …
Of the six origins of offences by how many origins does the offence of easing oneself … out of disrespect originate?
it originates by body and by mind, not by voice.
Concluded is the Fifth Chapter: that on Origins
